titles.title: Chincoteague Water Well Replacement Act
Chincoteague Water Well Replacement Act
To provide for drinking water well replacement for Chincoteague, Virginia, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary:
Chincoteague Water Well Replacement Act
This bill authorizes the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to reimburse the town of Chincoteague, Virginia, for costs associated with the removal, relocation, and replacement of drinking water wells located on NASA property.
